QuestData.Title: Clefthoof Training: Riplash
QuestData.Description: Many beasts will cower in fear at the sight of a mighty predator. In the desolate cliffs of Gorgrond lives one of the most fierce. It will prove your next challenge.$B$BTake your beast to the nest of the great Riplash, and see if you cannot emerge victorious.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Riplash while riding your Clefthoof-In-Training.
